label: relatedParty
comment: A trade party related to this facility production unit.

rangeIncludes.comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

domainIncludes.comment: Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
A defined set of production processes under the single management of a facility.
Any text or pattern put on the surface of a product using a specific material such as dye.
